actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to provide funds for the operation and maintenance of the Vietnam Veterans Peace and Brotherhood Chapel near Eagles Nest, New Mexico.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide funds for the operation and maintenance of the Vietnam Veterans Peace and Brotherhood Chapel near Eagles Nest, New Mexico. Limits such funds to the difference between operational costs and contributions provided by the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Fund, Incorporated.

titles.title: A bill to provide funds for the operation and maintenance of the Vietnam Veterans Peace and Brotherhood Chapel near Eagles Nest, New Mexico.
